all_answers.question: PLZ HELP ME SCIENCE PEA PLANTS
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: Inheritance is randomly chosen from the current gene pool. It's randomly decided whether offspring will receive certain types of traits from a certain parent. There are also dominant traits and recessive traits. Dominant traits are traits that overshadow recessive traits.
